com.shop.cache.api.client.io
Interface SCClientManager

All Superinterfaces:
SCClientServerCommon, SCManager
public interface SCClientManager
extends SCManager

Interface for managing multiple connections to a single cache server

serverIsDown

boolean serverIsDown()
Return true if the server is down

Returns:
true/false

getClient

SCClient getClient()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Return a client instance. releaseClient(SCClient) must be called afterwards

Returns:
a client or null if none available
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - errors

releaseClient

void releaseClient(SCClient client)
Balances a call to getClient() and releases the client it for other uses

Parameters:
client - the client

getAndClearLastException

java.lang.Exception getAndClearLastException()
Internal threads, etc. may have generated exceptions. Return any exception and clear the internal state.

Returns:
exception or null

registerException

void registerException(java.lang.Exception e)
Called to register an exception. This manager should respond by closing any clients and going into a "down" mode until new connections can be re-established.

Parameters:
e - exception
